maqras.text: His nation had no answer. Instead, they said, "Drive out the family of Loot from your town. They are folk who flaunt their chastity
But We rescued him and his family, except his wife. We decided she would be left behind
We heaped upon them a (wrenching) rain. What an evil rain for those forewarned
Say, "All praise is for Allah and peace be upon His servants _ those He has picked." (Say), "Who is better? Allah, or the partners you associate with Him

Isn´t it He Who created the heavens and the earth? Doesn´t He send water down from the sky, and with it, does He not produce splendid gardens? You do not make any of its trees grow! Are there gods besides Allah? Of course not! They are a nation ascribing other beings as equal (to Allah)

Isn´t it He who made the earth a stable place, ran rivers across its surface, caused immovable mountains to rise high and laid a barrier between the two seas? Are there gods besides Allah? Of course not! Most of them do not know
Isn´t it He Who responds to the call of the distressed and alleviates their suffering? Isn´t it He Who lets you inherit the earth? Are there gods besides Allah? You hardly think, or heed

Isn´t it He Who (guides and) shows you the way in the land and the sea, even when it is dark. The One Who sends winds heralding the good news of His mercy? Are there gods besides Allah? Exalted is Allah, far above all those they ascribe as His partners

Isn´t it He Who launched the creation (the first time)? Then, He will do it all over again! Isn´t it He Who (attends to your needs and) provides from the earth (below) and from the sky (above)? Are there gods besides Allah? Say, "Present your proof, if you are truthful
Say, "Absolutely no one in the heavens and on the earth knows the divine secrets, except Allah! Nobody has any idea when he (and everybody else) will be brought back to life
The knowledge of the life-to-come has eluded them. In fact, they are skeptical of its occurrence. Rather, they are oblivious of it
Those who have rejected say, "Will we really come back (to life)? After we and our forefathers have turned into dust
In the past, too, we were promised this, and so were our forefathers! These are really nothing but the tales of the earlier people
Tell them, "Move about in the land and observe. How (bad) did the criminals fare
Do not feel sorry for them, and do not feel depressed over their attempts to deceive
They say, "If you are honest tell us, when will that promise come about
Say, "Some of what you seek to hasten, may just happen to you next
Your Lord, of course, is the Lord of mercy (and He lavishly showers His favors) upon people. Yet, most of them fail to express gratitude
Your Lord certainly knows what their hearts hold back, just as well as what they declare
Every little secret in the heavens and on the earth is (committed to writing) in a clear record
Surely, for the children of Israel, this Qur´an clarifies most of the issues about which they differ
And for the believers it is certainly the guidance and the mercy
By His verdict, your Lord will settle (all issues) between them. He is the most Powerful and the all-Knowing
Place your trust in Allah! Of course, you are on the right track _ the plain and pristine truth
Surely, you cannot make the dead hear anything. Nor can you get the deaf to heed your call, if they turn their backs and run away
You cannot give directions to a blind man who has lost his way. You would only be able to tell those who believe and are ready to submit
